text: Laddukulla Boondhi Boondhi is a 2015 Indian Tamil comedy film directed by Jeans. It stars Jeans, Kiran Mayi, Devadarshini, Thalaivasal Vijay, Mahanadi Shankar, Jangiri Madhumitha, Aarthi. The story is about a man who has a dream in which all the men behave like women and all the women behave like men. All the actors in a film, including children, have played characters of the opposite gender. == Cast == *Jeans *Kiran Mayi *Devadarshini * Thalaivasal Vijay * Mahanadi Shankar * Jangiri Madhumitha * Aarthi ==References== Category:Indian films Category:Indian comedy films Category:2010s Tamil- language films
title: Laddukulla Boondhi Boondhi
